dontHaveAccount: Har yanzu ba ka da asusu?
verificationCodeSent: Mun aiko lambar tabbatarwa zuwa imel ɗin {{email}}. Shigar da ita a nan don ci gaba.
verificationFailed: Tabbatarwa ta kasa. Da fatan a sake gwadawa.
invalidCode: Lambar ba daidai ba ce. Da fatan a sake gwadawa.
codeExpired: Lambar tabbatarwa ta ƙare. Don Allah nema sabuwa
emailVerified: An riga an tabbatar da imel. Don Allah shiga.
passwordBreached: An gano kalmar wucewarka a cikin bayyanar bayanai. Don Allah yi amfani da wata.
passwordTooShort: Kalmar wucewa dole ta kasance akalla haruffa 8
introText: makomar kuɗin kai daga masu ƙirƙirar Weather.io da Chat.io masu amincewa.
empowerText: Finance.io na ba ku damar sarrafa kuɗinku—cikin tsaro, a fili, ba tare da sulhu ba.
openSourceDesc: Ta hanyar rungumar ka'idojin buɗaɗɗen tushe, Weather.io yana gayyatar haɗin gwiwa da kirkire-kirkire daga al'ummar masu haɓaka a duniya, yana tabbatar da mafita mai ƙarfi wadda za a iya daidaitawa da bukatunku.
noAdsDesc: Babu tallace-tallace. Babu hayaniya. Kwarewa mai tsabta wadda ta mayar da hankali kan walwalar kuɗinku.
noDataSellingDesc: Yawan aikace-aikace na samun kuɗi ta sayar da bayanan masu amfani—mu ba haka muke yi ba. Amincinku ya fi muhimmanci.
accountSetupIntro:
'Yan amsoshi kaɗan kawai
zamu shirya muku cikakkiyar
asusun kai tsaye.
usageHint: Amfanin asusun, misali Kullum, Asusun ajiya, Jari
invalidEmail: Don Allah shigar da sahihin imel
signInFailed: Shiga ta kasa. Don Allah duba bayananka
incorrectPassword: Kalmar wucewarka ba daidai ba ce
unknownError: An sami kuskure da ba a sani ba
fieldTooLong: {{field}} dole ta kasance ƙasa da haruffa {{max}}
bankNameTooShort: Sunan banki dole ya kasance akalla haruffa 2
bankNameTooLong: Sunan banki dole ya kasance ƙasa da haruffa 50
bankNameFormat: Sunan banki na iya ƙunsar haruffa, lambobi, sarari, da alamar haɗi
amountPositive: Adadi dole ya kasance mai kyau
referenceTooShort: Bayani dole ya kasance akalla haruffa 2
referenceTooLong: Bayani dole ya kasance ƙasa da haruffa 50
usageTooShort: Amfani dole ya kasance akalla haruffa 2
usageTooLong: Amfani dole ya kasance ƙasa da haruffa 50
